button.network_not_supported: You need to be connected to {expectedChainName} to perform this action

wrong_network.message: You need to be connected to {expectedChainName} to use this app, but you are currently connected to {currentChainName}.
wrong_network.message_unknown_network: You need to be connected to {expectedChainName} to use this app, please switch your network to continue.

partially_supported_network.message: You need to be connected to {expectedChainName} to use all the features of this app. That way, all the transactions that should happen on other networks would be sent as meta-transactions. Since you are currently connected to {currentChainName}, you will only be able to use the features of this app that interact with that particular network, and you will need to pay for the gas costs of those transactions.

options.desktop: You can use the {metamask_link} extension or your email account
options.mobile: You can use mobile browsers such as {coinbase_link} or {imtoken_link}.

modal.title: Sign In
modal.subtitle: Choose how you want to connect to Ethereum.
modal.supported_wallets: Trezor and smart contract wallets (like Dapper or Argent) cannot interact Polygon. Read more about the Trezor support status {trezor_link}
